query.sfwSql: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 300 SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME,SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID,PMI.PERSON_ID,PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME,P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID, ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION as ROLE_DESCRIPTION FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE AS PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME,SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID,PMI.PERSON_ID,PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID,P.FIRST_NAME,P.LAST_NAME,P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE where rownum <= 300
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT DISTINCT sa.process_id, sa.name, sa.activity_type_value, sai.*, spi.process_instance_id, pmi.person_id, pmi.org_id, p.person_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, p.middle_name, o.org_name, o.org_code, sp.description AS process_description, sp.name AS process_name, cv.description AS source_description, swr.person_id FROM dbo.sgw_bpm_activity_instance AS sai INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_process_instance AS spi ON sai.process_instance_id = spi.process_instance_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_process AS sp ON spi.process_id = sp.process_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_activity AS sa ON spi.process_id = sa.process_id AND sai.activity_id = sa.activity_id AND sa.activity_type_value = 'USTK' INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_case_instance AS pmi ON pmi.case_instance_id = spi.case_instance_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_request AS swr ON pmi.request_id = swr.request_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgt_person AS p ON p.person_id = pmi.person_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgt_organization AS o ON o.org_id = pmi.org_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgs_code_value AS cv ON swr.source_id = cv.code_id AND swr.source_value = cv.code_value

query.sfwSql: SELECT SUR.*, USR.USER_ID FROM SGS_USER_ROLES SUR WITH(NOLOCK) , SGS_USER USR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USR.USER_SERIAL_ID = SUR.USER_SERIAL_ID AND ((EFFECTIVE_START_DATE IS NULL) OR (EFFECTIVE_START_DATE < = GETDATE() AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL) OR (GETDATE() BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE))
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SUR.*, USR.USER_ID FROM SGS_USER_ROLES SUR , SGS_USER USR WHERE USR.USER_SERIAL_ID = SUR.USER_SERIAL_ID AND ((EFFECTIVE_START_DATE IS NULL) OR (EFFECTIVE_START_DATE < = UDF_GETAPPLICATIONDATE() AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL) OR (UDF_GETAPPLICATIONDATE() BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE))
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SUR.*, USR.USER_ID FROM SGS_USER_ROLES SUR , SGS_USER USR WHERE USR.USER_SERIAL_ID = SUR.USER_SERIAL_ID AND ((EFFECTIVE_START_DATE IS NULL) OR (EFFECTIVE_START_DATE <= now() AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE IS NULL) OR (now() BETWEEN EFFECTIVE_START_DATE AND EFFECTIVE_END_DATE))

query.sfwSql: select a.role_id, role_description from sgs_roles a, sgs_user_roles b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.user_serial_id = @user_serial_id
query.sfwPostgre: select a.role_id, role_description from sgs_roles a, sgs_user_roles b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.user_serial_id = @user_serial_id

query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM SGT_NOTES WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ((TABLE_NAME = 'SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE' AND PRIMARY_KEY_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID) OR (TABLE_NAME = 'SGW_BPM_REQUEST' AND PRIMARY_KEY_ID = @REQUEST_ID)) AND CATEGORY_ID = 93 AND CATEGORY_VALUE = 'BPNT' ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT * FROM SGT_NOTES WHERE ((TABLE_NAME = 'SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE' AND PRIMARY_KEY_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID) OR (TABLE_NAME = 'SGW_BPM_REQUEST' AND PRIMARY_KEY_ID = @REQUEST_ID)) AND CATEGORY_ID = 93 AND CATEGORY_VALUE = 'BPNT' ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC

query.sfwSql: SELECT DISTINCT TOP 100 SP.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SWR.REQUEST_ID, SWR.ORG_ID, SWR.PERSON_ID, SWR.SOURCE_VALUE, SWR.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, SPI.CREATED_DATE AS PI_CREATED_DATE, SAI.START_DATE AS AI_START_DATE, SAI.END_DATE AS AI_END_DATE, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , CONCAT (P.LAST_NAME, ' ', P.FIRST_NAME) AS PERSON_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AS AIU WITH(NOLOCK) ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE (SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'RELE', 'RESU', 'SUSP')) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')
query.sfwOracle: SELECT DISTINCT SP.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SWR.REQUEST_ID, SWR.ORG_ID, SWR.PERSON_ID, SWR.SOURCE_VALUE, SWR.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, SPI.CREATED_DATE AS PI_CREATED_DATE, SAI.START_DATE AS AI_START_DATE, SAI.END_DATE AS AI_END_DATE, O.ORG_NAME, P.LAST_NAME|| ',' ||P.FIRST_NAME AS PERSON_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS aiu ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE (SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')) AND rownum <=100 AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT DISTINCT SP.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SWR.REQUEST_ID, SWR.ORG_ID, SWR.PERSON_ID, SWR.SOURCE_VALUE, SWR.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, SPI.CREATED_DATE AS PI_CREATED_DATE, SAI.START_DATE AS AI_START_DATE, SAI.END_DATE AS AI_END_DATE, O.ORG_NAME, CONCAT (P.LAST_NAME, ' ', P.FIRST_NAME) AS PERSON_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE AS PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AS AIU ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE (SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_HISTORY_ID, SBAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, SBA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, SCV.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SBAIH.START_TIME, SBAIH.END_TIME, SBAIH.ACTION_USER_ID, SBAIH.COMMENTS FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY SBAIH WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SBAI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SBAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SBPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SBA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SBA.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBAIH.STATUS_ID = SCV.CODE_ID AND SBAIH.STATUS_VALUE = SCV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBPI.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID WHERE SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID ORDER BY SBAIH.CREATED_DATE DESC
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SBAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_HISTORY_ID, SBAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, SBA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, SCV.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS_DESCRIPTION, SBAIH.START_TIME, SBAIH.END_TIME, SBAIH.ACTION_USER_ID, SBAIH.COMMENTS FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY SBAIH INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SBAI ON SBAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SBAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SBPI ON SBAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SBA ON SBAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SBA.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV ON SBAIH.STATUS_ID = SCV.CODE_ID AND SBAIH.STATUS_VALUE = SCV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP ON SBPI.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID WHERE SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID ORDER BY SBAIH.CREATED_DATE DESC

query.sfwSql: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_HISTORY_ID IN (SELECT MAX(ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_HISTORY_ID) FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = @ACTIVITYINSTANCEID)
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT * FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY WHERE ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_HISTORY_ID IN (SELECT MAX(ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_HISTORY_ID) FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY WHERE ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = @ACTIVITYINSTANCEID)

query.sfwSql: SELECT EV.EVENT_DESC, spia.* FROM SGW_BPM_PRCS_INST_ATTACHMENTS SPIA WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT EV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPIA.DOC_TYPE = ev.DOC_TYPE WHERE SPIA.BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT EV.EVENT_DESC, spia.* FROM SGW_BPM_PRCS_INST_ATTACHMENTS SPIA INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT EV ON SPIA.DOC_TYPE = ev.DOC_TYPE WHERE SPIA.BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID

query.sfwSql:
SELECT DISTINCT TOP 200 SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID, PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, PRICV.DESCRIPTION AS PRIORITY_DESCRIPTION, ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION as ROLE_DESCRIPTION
FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS PRICV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRICV.CODE_ID = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_ID AND PRICV.CODE_VALUE = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AS AIU WITH(NOLOCK) ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE (AIU.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID OR (SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RESU','SUSP'))) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')
query.sfwOracle:
SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID, CIP1.PARAMETER_VALUE AS INSTANCEINFO1, CIP2.PARAMETER_VALUE AS INSTANCEINFO2, PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, PRICV.DESCRIPTION AS PRIORITY_DESCRIPTION
FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE PMI ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE PRICV ON PRICV.CODE_ID = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_ID AND PRICV.CODE_VALUE = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AIU ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INST_PARAMETER CIP1 ON (CIP1.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID AND CIP1.PARAMETER_NAME ='INS TANCEINFO1') LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INST_PARAMETER CIP2 ON (CIP2.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID AND CIP2.PARAMETER_NAME ='INS TANCEINFO2')
WHERE (AIU.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID OR (SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RESU','SUSP'))) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') and rownum <= 300
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT DISTINCT sa.process_id, sa.name, sa.activity_type_value, sai.*, spi.process_instance_id, pmi.person_id, pmi.org_id, p.person_id, p.first_name, p.last_name, p.middle_name, o.org_name, o.org_code, sp.description AS process_description, sp.name AS process_name, cv.description AS source_description, swr.person_id, cip1.parameter_value AS instanceinfo1, cip2.parameter_value AS instanceinfo2, pmi.priority_code_value, pricv.description AS priority_description FROM dbo.sgw_bpm_activity_instance AS sai INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_process_instance AS spi ON sai.process_instance_id = spi.process_instance_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_process AS sp ON spi.process_id = sp.process_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_activity AS sa ON spi.process_id = sa.process_id AND sai.activity_id = sa.activity_id AND sa.activity_type_value = 'USTK' INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_case_instance AS pmi ON pmi.case_instance_id = spi.case_instance_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_request AS swr ON pmi.request_id = swr.request_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgt_person AS p ON p.person_id = pmi.person_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgt_organization AS o ON o.org_id = pmi.org_id INNER JOIN dbo.sgs_code_value AS cv ON swr.source_id = cv.code_id AND swr.source_value = cv.code_value INNER JOIN dbo.sgs_code_value AS pricv ON pricv.code_id = pmi.priority_code_id AND pricv.code_value = pmi.priority_code_value::VARCHAR LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_activity_inst_users AS aiu ON aiu.activity_instance_id = sai.activity_instance_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_case_inst_parameter AS cip1 ON (cip1.case_instance_id = spi.case_instance_id AND cip1.parameter_name = 'INS TANCEINFO1') LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.sgw_bpm_case_inst_parameter AS cip2 ON (cip2.case_instance_id = spi.case_instance_id AND cip2.parameter_name = 'INS TANCEINFO2') WHERE (aiu.user_serial_id = @USER_SERIAL_ID OR (sai.checked_out_user = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND sai.status_value IN ('INPC', 'RESU', 'SUSP'))) AND (spi.status_value = 'INPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT case_instance_id FROM sgw_bpm_activity_instance a WITH(NOLOCK) , sgw_bpm_process_instance b WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE a.process_instance_id = b.process_instance_id AND a.activity_instance_id = @activity_instance_id
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT case_instance_id FROM sgw_bpm_activity_instance a , sgw_bpm_process_instance b WHERE a.process_instance_id = b.process_instance_id AND a.activity_instance_id = @activity_instance_id

query.sfwSql: SELECT SAI.* FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = SCI.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT SE ON SE.DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC','PROC','FAIL','RWRK','RCHK', 'INPC')
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SAI.* FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = SCI.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT SE ON SE.DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC','PROC','FAIL','RWRK','RCHK', 'INPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SAI.* FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = SCI.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT SE ON SE.DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC','PROC','FAIL','RWRK','RCHK', 'INPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT SAI.* FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = SCI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT SE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SE.DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE AND SCI.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC', 'PROC', 'FAIL', 'RWRK', 'RCHK', 'INPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT DISTINCT TOP (@MAX_RECORDS) SP.DESCRIPTION, SA.NAME, SAI.DUE_DATE, SAI.STATUS_ID, SAI.STATUS_VALUE, SAI.SUSPENSION_REASON_ID, SAI.SUSPENSION_REASON_VALUE, SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE ((SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER OR SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER IS NULL) AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RESU','RWRK','RCHK','UNPC')) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') AND PMI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID
query.sfwOracle: SELECT DISTINCT SP.DESCRIPTION, SA.NAME,SAI.DUE_DATE, SAI.STATUS_ID, SAI.STATUS_VALUE, SAI.SUSPENSION_REASON_ID, SAI.SUSPENSION_REASON_VALUE, SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE PMI ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE ((SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER OR SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER IS NULL) AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RESU','RWRK','RCHK','UNPC')) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') AND PMI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID FETCH NEXT @MAX_RECORDS ROWS ONLY

query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SP.DESCRIPTION, SA.NAME, SAI.DUE_DATE, SAI.STATUS_ID, SAI.STATUS_VALUE, SAI.SUSPENSION_REASON_ID, SAI.SUSPENSION_REASON_VALUE, SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE ((SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER OR SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER IS NULL) AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'RESU', 'RWRK', 'RCHK', 'UNPC')) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') AND PMI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID ) BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE

query.sfwSql: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME, DATEDIFF(day,START_DATE,END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(day,CHECKED_OUT_DATE,END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(minute,START_DATE,END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DATEDIFF(minute,CHECKED_OUT_DATE,END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM (SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,BC.VERSION) + ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') ) AS DATA
query.sfwOracle: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME , END_DATE - START_DATE AS ELAPSED_DAYS , END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS , ROUND(TO_NUMBER(END_DATE-START_DATE)*1440) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES , ROUND(TO_NUMBER(END_DATE - CHECKED_OUT_DATE)*1440) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES , DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM ( SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION || '(Ver.' || CAST(BC.VERSION AS VARCHAR(10)) || ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE , CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN SYSDT ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE , BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'),'MM-DD-YYYY') AS SYSDT FROM DUAL ) DT ON 1=1 INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') )A
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME, DATE_PART('day',END_DATE-START_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATE_PART('day',END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS, DATE_PART('minute',END_DATE-START_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DATE_PART('minute',END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM (SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, bp.description || '(Ver.' || CAST (bc.version AS VARCHAR(30)) || ')' AS process_name, BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN now() ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') ) AS DATA

query.sfwSql: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME, DATEDIFF(day,START_DATE,END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(day,CHECKED_OUT_DATE,END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(minute,START_DATE,END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DATEDIFF(minute,CHECKED_OUT_DATE,END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM (SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,BC.VERSION) + ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') AND BC.CASE_ID = @CASE_ID ) AS DATA
query.sfwOracle: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME , END_DATE - START_DATE AS ELAPSED_DAYS , END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS , ROUND(TO_NUMBER(END_DATE-START_DATE)*1440) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES , ROUND(TO_NUMBER(END_DATE - CHECKED_OUT_DATE)*1440) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES , DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM ( SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION || '(Ver.' || CAST(BC.VERSION AS VARCHAR(10)) || ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE , CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN SYSDT ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE , BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'),'MM-DD-YYYY') AS SYSDT FROM DUAL ) DT ON 1=1 INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') AND BC.CASE_ID = COALESCE(@CASE_ID, BC.CASE_ID) )A
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME, DATE_PART('day',END_DATE-START_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATE_PART('day',END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS, DATE_PART('minute',END_DATE-START_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DATE_PART('minute',END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM (SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, bp.description || '(Ver.' || CAST (bc.version AS VARCHAR(30)) || ')' AS process_name, BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN now() ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') AND BC.CASE_ID = @CASE_ID ) AS DATA

query.sfwSql: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME, DATEDIFF(day,START_DATE,END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(day,CHECKED_OUT_DATE,END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(minute,START_DATE,END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DATEDIFF(minute,CHECKED_OUT_DATE,END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM (SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,BC.VERSION) + ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') AND BC.CASE_ID = @CASE_ID AND BP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID ) AS DATA
query.sfwOracle: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, ACTIVITY_NAME , END_DATE - START_DATE AS ELAPSED_DAYS , END_DATE-CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS , ROUND(TO_NUMBER(END_DATE-START_DATE)*1440) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES , ROUND(TO_NUMBER(END_DATE - CHECKED_OUT_DATE)*1440) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES , DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM ( SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION || '(Ver.' || CAST(BC.VERSION AS VARCHAR(10)) || ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE , CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN SYSDT ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE , BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI JOIN ( SELECT TO_DATE(UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y'),'MM-DD-YYYY') AS SYSDT FROM DUAL ) DT ON 1=1 INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') AND BC.CASE_ID = COALESCE(@CASE_ID, BC.CASE_ID) AND BP.PROCESS_ID = COALESCE(@PROCESS_ID, BP.PROCESS_ID) )A

query.sfwSql: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, PROCESS_NAME, PROCESS_ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_ID, DATEDIFF(day, START_DATE, END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(day, CHECKED_OUT_DATE, END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(minute, START_DATE, END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DATEDIFF(minute, CHECKED_OUT_DATE, END_DATE) AS USER_UTILIZED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, DUE_DATE, CASE WHEN FIRST_NAME IS NULL THEN 'Un-Assigned' ELSE FIRST_NAME END AS FIRST_NAME FROM (SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID, BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, BC.VERSION) + ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BP.PROCESS_ID, BA.ACTIVITY_ID, BA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME, BAI.START_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BAI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE BAI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BAI.CHECKED_OUT_DATE AS CHECKED_OUT_DATE, BAI.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, SU.FIRST_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID AND BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE IN ('USTK') INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_USER SU WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = SU.USER_ID WHERE BAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC', 'SUSP') AND SU.USER_ID = @USER_ID ) AS DATA order BY PROCESS_ID;

query.sfwSql: SELECT PROCESS_NAME, DATEDIFF(day, START_DATE, END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_DAYS, DATEDIFF(minute, START_DATE, END_DATE) AS ELAPSED_TIME_IN_MINUTES, PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID FROM (SELECT BP.DESCRIPTION + '(Ver.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, BC.VERSION) + ')' AS PROCESS_NAME , BPI.CREATED_DATE AS START_DATE, CASE WHEN BPI.END_DATE IS NULL THEN GETDATE() ELSE BPI.END_DATE END AS END_DATE, BPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE BPI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS BP WITH(NOLOCK) ON BPI.PROCESS_ID = BP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE BC WITH(NOLOCK) ON BP.CASE_ID = BC.CASE_ID WHERE BPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') AS DATA

query.sfwSql: SELECT sum(case when AI.DUE_DATE > getdate() then 1 else 0 end) AS OnTime, sum(case when AI.DUE_DATE < getdate() then 1 else 0 end) AS OverDue, A.NAME AS ActivityName FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY A WITH(NOLOCK) ON AI.ACTIVITY_ID = A.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND AI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' GROUP BY A.NAME
query.sfwOracle: SELECT sum(case when AI.DUE_DATE > (SELECT UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y')from dual) then 1 else 0 end) AS OnTime, sum(case when AI.DUE_DATE < (SELECT UDF_GET_SYSTEM_DATE('Y') from dual) then 1 else 0 end) AS OverDue, A.NAME AS ActivityName FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY A ON AI.ACTIVITY_ID = A.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND AI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' GROUP BY A.NAME
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT sum(case when AI.DUE_DATE > now() then 1 else 0 end) AS OnTime, sum(case when AI.DUE_DATE < now() then 1 else 0 end) AS OverDue, A.NAME AS ActivityName FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY A ON AI.ACTIVITY_ID = A.ACTIVITY_ID WHERE CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND AI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' GROUP BY A.NAME

query.sfwSql: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND AI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC'
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI WHERE CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND AI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC'

query.sfwSql: SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS BAIU WITH(NOLOCK) ON BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = BAIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' AND ((BAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER) OR (BAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'UNPC' AND BAIU.USER_ID = @CHECKED_OUT_USER))
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE BAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY BA ON BAI.ACTIVITY_ID = BA.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS BAIU ON BAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = BAIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE BA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' AND ((BAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND BAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER) OR (BAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'UNPC' AND BAIU.USER_ID = @CHECKED_OUT_USER))

query.sfwSql: SELECT SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND SA.NAME = @ACTIVITY_NAME AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'SUSP')
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND SA.NAME = @ACTIVITY_NAME AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','SUSP')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND SA.NAME = @ACTIVITY_NAME AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'SUSP')

query.sfwSql: SELECT SAI.* FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = SCI.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT SE WITH(NOLOCK) ON SE.DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE AND SCI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC', 'PROC', 'FAIL', 'RWRK', 'RCHK', 'INPC')
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SAI.* FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = SCI.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_EVENT SE ON SE.DOC_TYPE = @DOC_TYPE AND SCI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SP.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @ACTIVITY_ID WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE NOT IN ('CANC','PROC','FAIL','RWRK','RCHK', 'INPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'SUSP' AND SAI.SUSPENSION_END_DATE < = @NOW
query.sfwOracle: SELECT SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'SUSP' AND SAI.SUSPENSION_END_DATE < = @NOW
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE = 'SUSP' AND SAI.SUSPENSION_END_DATE <= @NOW

query.sfwSql: SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('FAIL') AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')
query.sfwOracle: SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, (select SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID from dual fetch first 300 rows only), PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('FAIL') AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT DISTINCT SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE AS PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE WHERE SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('FAIL') AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT COUNT(ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID) as TOTALCOUNT FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = @FIRSTACTIVITYID AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','UNPC')

SELECT DISTINCT TOP 300 SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID, PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, PRICV.DESCRIPTION AS PRIORITY_DESCRIPTION, ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION as ROLE_DESCRIPTION
FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS PRICV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRICV.CODE_ID = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_ID AND PRICV.CODE_VALUE = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL WITH(NOLOCK) ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID WHERE (SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('PROC'))

SELECT DISTINCT TOP 200 SA.PROCESS_ID, SA.NAME, SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE, SAI.*, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, PMI.PERSON_ID, PMI.ORG_ID, P.PERSON_ID, P.FIRST_NAME, P.LAST_NAME, P.MIDDLE_NAME, O.ORG_NAME, O.ORG_CODE , SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, CV.DESCRIPTION AS SOURCE_DESCRIPTION, SWR.PERSON_ID, PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE, PRICV.DESCRIPTION AS PRIORITY_DESCRIPTION, ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION as ROLE_DESCRIPTION
FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS PRICV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRICV.CODE_ID = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_ID AND PRICV.CODE_VALUE = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL WITH(NOLOCK) ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AS AIU WITH(NOLOCK) ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE (AIU.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID OR (SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RESU'))) AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') AND (ISNULL(SAI.STATUS_VALUE,'') NOT IN ('SUSP', 'PROC'))

SELECT TOP 5 SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH (NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE= 'INPC' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH (NOLOCK) ON SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS SCI WITH (NOLOCK) ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID AND SCI.STATUS_VALUE= 'INPC' WHERE (SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER IS NULL AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('SUSP','UNPC')) AND SAI.MODIFIED_DATE < @TIMER_START_DATETIME ORDER BY SAI.MODIFIED_DATE

SET NOCOUNT ON
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#TempTable') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #TempTable
create table #TempTable ( TEMP_TABLE_RECORD_ID INT identity(1,1) PRIMARY KEY, Activity_Id INT, PERSON_ID INT, STANDARD_TIME INT, SumDateDiff INT, TimeDiff INT, CHECKED_OUT_USER Varchar(50), PROCESS_NAME varchar(500), ACTIVITY_NAME varchar(500) )
INSERT INTO #TempTable SELECT AI.Activity_Id AS Activity_Id , PMI.PERSON_ID AS Person_Id, ACT.SLA_MINUTES AS Standard_Time, SUM(ISNULL(dbo.GetWorkingTimeInMinutes(Start_time, End_time),0)) as SumDateDiff, (SUM(ISNULL(dbo.GetWorkingTimeInMinutes(Start_time, End_time),0)) - ACT.SLA_MINUTES ) AS TimeDiff, AI.CHECKED_OUT_USER, DESCRIPTION as PROCESS_NAME, ACT.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY AIH WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI WITH(NOLOCK) ON AIH.Activity_Instance_Id = AI.Activity_Instance_Id AND AI.Status_Value = 'PROC' Inner Join SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AP WITH(NOLOCK) on AI.Process_instance_id = AP.Process_instance_id INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_INSTANCE PMI ON PMI.case_INSTANCE_ID = AP.case_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY ACT WITH(NOLOCK) ON AI.Activity_Id = ACT.Activity_Id and ACT.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' inner join SGW_BPM_PROCESS PR WITH(NOLOCK) on AP.PROCESS_ID = PR.PROCESS_ID GROUP BY AI.Activity_Id , PMI.PERSON_ID , ACT.SLA_MINUTES, AI.CHECKED_OUT_USER, DESCRIPTION , ACT.NAME
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX IX_TempTable_TIMEDIFF ON #TempTable(TEMP_TABLE_RECORD_ID, TimeDiff, Activity_Id) INCLUDE (PROCESS_NAME,ACTIVITY_NAME,PERSON_ID,Standard_Time, SumDateDiff)
SELECT PROCESS_NAME, Activity_Id , ACTIVITY_NAME, PERSON_ID , Standard_Time, SumDateDiff, TimeDiff, CAST((Standard_Time)/480 as Varchar(3)) +':' + Cast(((Standard_Time)- (Standard_Time)/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((Standard_Time) - (((Standard_Time)/480 * 480) + (((Standard_Time)- (Standard_Time)/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS FormatedStd_Time, CAST((SumDateDiff)/480 as Varchar(3)) +':' + Cast(((SumDateDiff)- (SumDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((SumDateDiff) - (((SumDateDiff)/480 * 480) + (((SumDateDiff)- (SumDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS Formated_ActualDuration, CAST((ABS(TimeDiff))/480 as Varchar(3)) +':' + Cast(((ABS(TimeDiff))- (ABS(TimeDiff))/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((ABS(TimeDiff)) - (((ABS(TimeDiff))/480 * 480) + (((ABS(TimeDiff))- (ABS(TimeDiff))/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS Formatted_TimeDiff, CHECKED_OUT_USER FROM #TempTable Temp WHERE TimeDiff > 0 SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TempTable as table ( Action_User_Id Varchar(50), ACTIVITY_Id INT, Status_value Varchar(4), Status_Description VARCHAR(50), [COUNT] INT, [MinDateDiff] INT, [MaxDateDiff] INT, [SumDateDiff] BIGINT, [MedianDateDiff] INT )
DECLARE @TempAIHTable as table ( Action_User_Id Varchar(50), Status_Id int, Status_value Varchar(4), Activity_Instance_Id int, Start_time datetime, End_Time datetime, TimeDiff BIGINT )
INSERT INTO @TempAIHTable SELECT CASE WHEN Status_value = 'UNPC' THEN NULL ELSE Action_User_Id END AS Action_User_Id, Status_Id,Status_value,Activity_Instance_Id,Start_time,End_Time, ISNULL(dbo.GetWorkingTimeInMinutes(Start_time, End_time),0) AS TimeDiff FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY (nolock)
INSERT INTO @TempTable SELECT AIH.Action_User_Id AS Action_User_Id, AI.ACTIVITY_Id AS ACTIVITY_Id , AIH.Status_value, CV.Description AS Status_Description,
COUNT('0') AS [COUNT], MIN(TimeDiff) as MinDateDiff, MAX(TimeDiff) as MaxDateDiff, SUM(TimeDiff) as SumDateDiff,
( SELECT TOP 1 DateDiff as MedianDateDif FROM ( SELECT TOP 50 PERCENT TimeDiff AS DateDiff FROM @TempAIHTable AIH1 INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI1 (nolock) ON AIH1.Activity_Instance_Id = AI1.Activity_Instance_Id WHERE (AIH1.Action_User_Id = AIH.Action_User_Id OR (AIH1.Action_User_ID IS NULL AND AIH.Action_User_Id IS NULL)) AND AI1.ACTIVITY_Id = AI.ACTIVITY_Id AND AIH1.Status_value =AIH.Status_value ORDER BY TimeDiff DESC ) A ORDER BY DateDiff ASC ) AS [MedianDateDiff]
FROM @TempAIHTable AIH INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AI (nolock) ON AIH.Activity_Instance_Id = AI.Activity_Instance_Id INNER JOIN Sgs_Code_Value CV (nolock) ON AIH.Status_Id = CV.Code_Id AND AIH.Status_value = CV.Code_Value
GROUP BY AIH.Action_User_Id, AI.ACTIVITY_Id, AIH.Status_value, CV.Description
SELECT Action_User_Id , SAP.NAME + ' - ' + SAP.Name + ' (' + RO.ROLE_DESCRIPTION + ')' AS ROLE_NAME, Temp.ACTIVITY_Id , Status_Description, [COUNT], CAST((MaxDateDiff)/480 as Varchar(10)) +':' + Cast(((MaxDateDiff)- (MaxDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((MaxDateDiff) - (((MaxDateDiff)/480 * 480) + (((MaxDateDiff)- (MaxDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS MaxDateDiff, CAST((MedianDateDiff)/480 as Varchar(10)) +':' + Cast(((MedianDateDiff)- (MedianDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((MedianDateDiff) - (((MedianDateDiff)/480 * 480) + (((MedianDateDiff)- (MedianDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS MedianDateDiff, CAST((MinDateDiff)/480 as Varchar(10)) +':' + Cast(((MinDateDiff)- (MinDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((MinDateDiff) - (((MinDateDiff)/480 * 480) + (((MinDateDiff)- (MinDateDiff)/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS MinDateDiff, CAST((SumDateDiff/[COUNT])/480 as Varchar(10)) +':' + Cast(((SumDateDiff/[COUNT])- (SumDateDiff/[COUNT])/480 * 480)/60 As Varchar(2))+':'+right('00'+Cast(((SumDateDiff/[COUNT]) - (((SumDateDiff/[COUNT])/480 * 480) + (((SumDateDiff/[COUNT])- (SumDateDiff/[COUNT])/480 * 480)/60)*60)) as Varchar(2)),2) AS MEAN_AVERAGE FROM @TempTable Temp INNER JOIN SGw_BPM_ACTIVITY SAP (nolock) ON Temp.ACTIVITY_ID=SAP.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAP.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID and SAP.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGS_ROLES RO (nolock) ON RO.ROLE_ID=AR.ROLE_ID WHERE Status_value NOT IN ('UNPC')
SET NOCOUNT OFF

SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TempTable as table ( PERSLinkID_OrgID varchar(100), LastName_OrgName varchar(100), Initiated datetime, current_status varchar(100), [Role] varchar(100), elapsed_time int, activity_name varchar(100) )
INSERT INTO @TempTable select isnull(cast(SCI.person_id as nvarchar(10)), right('000000'+cast(c.org_code as varchar(10)),6)) as PERSLinkID_OrgID, case when SCI.person_id is null then c.org_name else b.last_name end as LastName_OrgName, (a.created_date) as Initiated, cv.Description as current_status, rol.role_description as [Role], ISNULL(dbo.GetWorkingTimeInMinutes(a.created_date, getdate()),0) as elapsed_time, SA.Name as activity_name from dbo.SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE a left join sgs_code_value cv ON a.status_id=cv.CODE_ID AND a.status_value=cv.CODE_VALUE inner join sgW_BPM_activity SA on SA.activity_id = a.activity_id INNER JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID Inner Join SGW_BPM_Process_instance AP on A.Process_instance_id = AP.Process_instance_id INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON AP.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID
left join sgt_person b on SCI.person_id=b.person_id left join sgt_organization c on SCI.org_id=c.org_id left join sgs_roles rol ON AR.role_id=rol.role_id where a.status_value IN ('UNPC','RELE') and (ISNULL(dbo.GetWorkingTimeInMinutes(a.created_date, getdate()),0) >= 1440)
SELECT PERSLinkID_OrgID,LastName_OrgName,Initiated,current_status,[Role], CAST((elapsed_time)/480 as Varchar(3)) AS elapsed_time, activity_name FROM @TempTable ORDER BY elapsed_time/480 desc,cast(PERSLinkID_OrgID as int) SET NOCOUNT OFF

IF OBJECT_ID('TEMPDB..#FINAL_TABLE') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #FINAL_TABLE
DECLARE @TEMPTABLE AS TABLE ( PERSLINKID_ORGID VARCHAR(100), LASTNAME_ORGNAME VARCHAR(100), INITIATED DATETIME, CURRENT_STATUS VARCHAR(100), ACTIVITY_ROLE VARCHAR(100), ELAPSED_TIME INT, ACTIVITY_NAME VARCHAR(100) )
INSERT INTO @TEMPTABLE SELECT ISNULL(CAST(SCI.PERSON_ID AS NVARCHAR(10)), RIGHT('000000'+CAST(C.ORG_CODE AS VARCHAR(10)),6)) AS PERSLINKID_ORGID, CASE WHEN SCI.PERSON_ID IS NULL THEN C.ORG_NAME ELSE B.LAST_NAME END AS LASTNAME_ORGNAME, (A.CREATED_DATE) AS INITIATED, CV.DESCRIPTION AS CURRENT_STATUS, ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION AS [ROLE], ISNULL(DBO.GETWORKINGTIMEINMINUTES(A.CREATED_DATE, GETDATE()),0) AS ELAPSED_TIME, SA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME FROM DBO.SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE A LEFT JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE CV ON A.STATUS_ID=CV.CODE_ID AND A.STATUS_VALUE=CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = A.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AP ON A.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = AP.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON AP.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON B ON SCI.PERSON_ID=B.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION C ON SCI.ORG_ID=C.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID WHERE A.STATUS_VALUE IN ('UNPC','RELE') AND (ISNULL(DBO.GETWORKINGTIMEINMINUTES(A.CREATED_DATE, GETDATE()),0) >= 1440)
SELECT ACTIVITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_ROLE, CAST(DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, INITIATED), 0) AS DATE) AS MONTH_YEAR INTO #FINAL_TABLE FROM @TEMPTABLE
DECLARE @cols NVARCHAR(MAX)='' DECLARE @query NVARCHAR(MAX)='' DECLARE @COLS_SUM NVARCHAR(MAX)='' DECLARE @COLS_TOT NVARCHAR(MAX)=''
--Preparing columns for Pivot SELECT @cols = @cols + QUOTENAME(MONTH_YEAR) + ',' FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MONTH_YEAR FROM #FINAL_TABLE) AS tmp ORDER BY tmp.MONTH_YEAR SELECT @cols = SUBSTRING(@cols, 0, LEN(@cols)) IF(@cols = '') BEGIN SET @cols= '[1901]' END --Preparing sum of columns for Totals Horizontal SELECT @COLS_SUM = @COLS_SUM + QUOTENAME(MONTH_YEAR) + '+' FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MONTH_YEAR FROM #FINAL_TABLE) AS tmp ORDER BY tmp.MONTH_YEAR IF(@COLS_SUM <> '') BEGIN SELECT @COLS_SUM = ','+ SUBSTRING(@COLS_SUM, 0, LEN(@COLS_SUM)) +' AS TOTAL' END ELSE BEGIN SELECT @COLS_SUM = ',0 AS TOTAL' END --Preparing sum of individual columns for Totals Vertically SELECT @COLS_TOT = @COLS_TOT +'SUM('+ QUOTENAME(MONTH_YEAR) + '),' FROM (SELECT DISTINCT MONTH_YEAR FROM #FINAL_TABLE) AS tmp ORDER BY tmp.MONTH_YEAR SELECT @COLS_TOT = SUBSTRING(@COLS_TOT, 0, LEN(@COLS_TOT)) IF(@COLS_TOT = '') BEGIN SET @COLS_TOT= '0' END
SET @query = 'SELECT *'+@COLS_SUM+' INTO #TAB FROM ( SELECT ACTIVITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_ROLE, MONTH_YEAR FROM #FINAL_TABLE ) src PIVOT ( COUNT(MONTH_YEAR) FOR MONTH_YEAR IN (' + @cols + ') ) piv SELECT *, 0 AS CUSTOMORDER INTO #TAB2 FROM #TAB UNION ALL SELECT ''GRAND_TOTAL'' AS TOTAL, ''GRAND_TOTAL'' AS TOTAL,'+@COLS_TOT+',SUM(TOTAL), 1 AS CUSTOMORDER FROM #TAB ORDER BY CUSTOMORDER,#TAB.ACTIVITY_NAME, #TAB.ACTIVITY_ROLE SELECT ACTIVITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_ROLE, ' + @cols + ', TOTAL FROM #TAB2 WHERE REPLACE(''' + @cols + ''','','','''') <> ''[1901]'' ORDER BY #TAB2.CUSTOMORDER,#TAB2.ACTIVITY_NAME, #TAB2.ACTIVITY_ROLE' execute(@query)

SELECT SA.Name AS ACTIVITY_NAME, SCV.DESCRIPTION AS STATUS_DESCRIPTION,SAIH.START_TIME,SAIH.END_TIME,SAIH.ACTION_USER_ID FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_HISTORY SAIH INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE SAI ON SAIH.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY SA ON SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE='USTK' INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV ON SAIH.STATUS_ID = SCV.CODE_ID AND SAIH.STATUS_VALUE = SCV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SP ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID order by SAIH.CREATED_DATE DESC

SELECT DISTINCT DATEDIFF(day, SAI.START_DATE, GETDATE()) AS istrOutstandingDays, SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SP.PROCESS_ID, SA.ACTIVITY_ID, SAI.*, PMI.PERSON_ID, O.ORG_CODE , ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION as ROLE_DESCRIPTION, SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, SA.NAME AS ACTIVITY_NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS PRICV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRICV.CODE_ID = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_ID AND PRICV.CODE_VALUE = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AS AIU WITH(NOLOCK) ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE ((AIU.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RELE','SUSP','RESU','UNPC'))OR (SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC','RELE','SUSP','RESU','UNPC'))) --AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') order by sai.CHECKED_OUT_USER desc, sai.activity_instance_id desc

SELECT DISTINCT SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SP.PROCESS_ID, SA.ACTIVITY_ID, SAI.*, PMI.PERSON_ID, O.ORG_CODE , ROL.ROLE_DESCRIPTION as ROLE_DESCRIPTION, SP.DESCRIPTION AS PROCESS_DESCRIPTION, SP.NAME AS PROCESS_NAME, SA.NAME FROM SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE AS SAI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE AS SPI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SAI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS AS SP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY AS SA WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPI.PROCESS_ID = SA.PROCESS_ID AND SAI.ACTIVITY_ID = SA.ACTIVITY_ID AND SA.ACTIVITY_TYPE_VALUE = 'USTK' INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE AS PMI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST AS SWR WITH(NOLOCK) ON PMI.REQUEST_ID = SWR.REQUEST_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON AS P WITH(NOLOCK) ON P.PERSON_ID = PMI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION AS O WITH(NOLOCK) ON O.ORG_ID = PMI.ORG_ID INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS CV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SWR.SOURCE_ID = CV.CODE_ID AND SWR.SOURCE_VALUE = CV.CODE_VALUE INNER JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE AS PRICV WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRICV.CODE_ID = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_ID AND PRICV.CODE_VALUE = PMI.PRIORITY_CODE_VALUE LEFT JOIN SGT_BPM_ACTIVITY_ROLE_XR AR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SA.ACTIVITY_ID = AR.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN SGS_ROLES ROL ON AR.ROLE_ID=ROL.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SGW_BPM_ACTIVITY_INST_USERS AS AIU WITH(NOLOCK) ON AIU.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID = SAI.ACTIVITY_INSTANCE_ID WHERE ((AIU.USER_SERIAL_ID = @USER_SERIAL_ID AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('PROC')) OR (SAI.CHECKED_OUT_USER = @CHECKED_OUT_USER AND SAI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('PROC'))) --AND (SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC') and CONVERT(DATE, (ISNULL(SPI.END_DATE,'01/01/2900'))) between @Date_From and @Date_To order by sai.CHECKED_OUT_USER desc, sai.activity_instance_id desc
